comments: Tests on the textbook can be tricky, but he mostly follows the study guide he gives you. No tests on the Microsoft exercises.

took environmental science. VERY good instructor who knows what he is talking about. i am not good at science nor do i enjoy it, but he makes the class and topics interesting. i wish he taught more classes so i could take another class of his.

When he stands in front of the projector & makes his usually goofy faces, it\'s really funny. He\'s nice. DON\'T BE LATE. 1 paper-good and easy, several quizzes-pretty easy(from book), few tests-medium(straight from your notes, which you can use), he might do some take-home quizzes too. He may be slightly boring but he\'s a good guy.
